ReportSection.name: Consent
ReportSection.title: Consent

ReportItem.yes: Yes, I agree to the above Declaration
ReportItem.no: No, I do not agree to the above Declaration

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Personal information on this form is collected under the authority of Section 33(c) of Alberta’s Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act and will be protected under Part 2 of that Act. It will be used for authorized purposes including admission and registration; administration of records, scholarships and awards, student services; and university planning and research. Students’ personal information may be used by academic and administrative units according to university policy, and operational needs. It is disclosed pursuant to federal and provincial regulatory reporting requirements, data sharing agreements with student governance associations, and to contracted or public health care providers as required. Direct any questions about this collection to the Admissions Services Supervisor, Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research, Killam Centre for Advanced Studies, 2-29 Triffo Hall, University of Alberta, Edmonton, AB T6G 2E1, 780-492-3499 or visit the Information and Privacy Office website.

You must agree to the following declaration before submitting your application:

  • I agree, if admitted to the University of Alberta, to comply with University regulations.
  • I certify that the information in this application is true and complete in all respects and that I have withheld no information.
  • I authorize the University to verify any information provided as part of this application.
  • I understand that misrepresentation, falsification of documents, or withholding of requested information regarding this application are serious offences and may result in prosecution under the University's Code of Applicant Behaviour, Code of Student Behaviour and/or the Criminal Code of Canada.
  • I attest that I have completed all questions to the best of my ability and without the assistance of other individuals.
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                                var consent = '{getText(RP_AVOID,AVOID_CHECK_EULA,EULA,0,{$user_id},0)}' == "Yes";

                                if(!consent){
                                        $("#SociodemographicInformation").hide();
                                        $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").hide();
                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").hide();
                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").hide();
                                }
                                else{
                                        $("#SociodemographicInformation").show();
                                        $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").show();
                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").show();
                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").show();
                                }
                                function checkConsent(){
                                        var consent = '{getText(RP_AVOID,AVOID_CHECK_EULA,EULA,0,{$user_id},0)}' == "Yes";
                                        if(consent){
                                                $("#SociodemographicInformation").show();
                                                $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").show();
                                                $("#HealthRelatedQoL").show();
                                                $("#FrailtyStatus").show();                                        
                                        }
                                        else{
                                                $("#SociodemographicInformation").hide();
                                                $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").hide();
                                                $("#HealthRelatedQoL").hide();
                                                $("#FrailtyStatus").hide();
                                        }
                                }
                                _.defer(checkConsent);
                                $("input:radio[name='Consent_eula']").change(checkConsent);
                        </script>

ReportSection.name: Sociodemographic Information
ReportSection.title: Sociodemographic Information
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                                        var consent = '{getText(RP_AVOID,AVOID_CHECK_EULA,EULA,0,{$user_id},0)}' == "Yes";
                                        if(!consent){
                                                $("#SociodemographicInformation").hide();
                                                $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").hide();
                                                $("#HealthRelatedQoL").hide();
                                                $("#FrailtyStatus").hide();
                                        }
                                        else{
                                                $("#SociodemographicInformation").show();
                                                $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").show();
                                                $("#HealthRelatedQoL").show();
                                                $("#FrailtyStatus").show();
                                        }
                                        function checkConsent(){
                                                var consent = '{getText(RP_AVOID,AVOID_CHECK_EULA,EULA,0,{$user_id},0)}' == "Yes";
                                                if(consent){
                                                        $("#SociodemographicInformation").show();
                                                        $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").show();
                                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").show();
                                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").show();                                        
                                                }
                                                else{
                                                        $("#SociodemographicInformation").hide();
                                                        $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").hide();
                                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").hide();
                                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").hide();
                                                }
                                        }
                                        _.defer(checkConsent);
                                        $("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_socio_info1']").change(checkConsent);
                                </script>

NOTE: Please answer the questions in this section to the best of your ability. This is important information to help us understand who is using the program (and consequently, who isn't) so that we can make sure we are helping everyone who needs it. As more information is gathered, we will be able to personalize the experience for you and future users!
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Age

{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                                        function checkAge(){
						if($("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_socio_info1']").val() == "less than 60"){
							var age = 40;
						}
						else{
                                                        age = parseInt($("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_socio_info1']").val());
						}
                                                if(age >=65){
                                                        $("#SociodemographicInformation").show();
                                                        $("#BehaviouralSelf-Assessment").show();
                                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").show();
                                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").show();                                        
                                                }
                                                else{
                                                        $("#HealthRelatedQoL").hide();
                                                        $("#FrailtyStatus").hide();
                                                }
                                        }
                                        _.defer(checkAge);
                                        $("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_socio_info1']").change(checkAge);
                                </script>

Gender refers to social roles and expectations, behaviors, expressions, and identities of girls, women, boys, men, and gender-diverse people.

ReportItem.options: I was born in Canada|I obtained permanent resident status (landed immigrant) in Canada less than 5 years ago|I obtained permanent resident status (landed immigrant) in Canada 5 years ago or more|I am a refugee claimant|I am a non-permanent resident (e.g., holder of a work or study permit)|I am a Convention refugee or protected person (this means you have been formally approved as a refugee)|I became a Canadian citizen|None of the above applies to me|Don’t know|Prefer not to answer

Which category best describes your immigrant status?

{$item}
ReportSection.Static: People of different ethnicities do not have significantly different genetics. But our ethnicity still has important consequences including how we are treated by different individuals and institutions.

ReportItem.options: Black|East/Southeast Asian|Indigenous (First Nations, Metis, Inuk/Inuit)|Latino|Middle Eastern|South Asian|White|Another race category|Do not know|Prefer not to answer

Do you identify as First Nations, Metis, or inuk/Inuit? (check all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
				$('span#indigenous_specify').hide();
				function specifyIndigenous(){
                                	if($("input:checkbox[value='Indigenous (First Nations, Metis, Inuk/Inuit)']").is(':checked')){
                                        	$('span#indigenous_specify').show();
                                       	}
					else{ $('span#indigenous_specify').hide();}
				}
                                _.defer(specifyIndigenous);
				$("input:checkbox[name='SociodemographicInformation_ethnicity_avoid[]']").change(specifyIndigenous);

                                $('span#indigenous_other').hide();
                                function specifyIndigenousOther(){
                                        if($("input:checkbox[value='Other']").is(':checked')){
                                                $('span#indigenous_other').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#indigenous_other').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyIndigenousOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='SociodemographicInformation_ethnicity_indigenous[]']").change(specifyIndigenousOther);
                   	</script>

ReportSection.Static: An assistive device is any device or tool designed or adapted to help a person perform a particular task or activity.

ReportItem.options: a cane, a walking stick or crutches|a walker|a scooter|a manual wheelchair|a motorized wheelchair|orthopaedic footwear|an orthotic or a brace|a prosthetic device or an artificial limb|a grasping tool or a reach extender|adapted tools, utensils or special grips|a device for dressing (e.g., button hook, zipper pull, long-handled shoe horn)|a device with oversized buttons (e.g., remote control or telephone)|None

Do you use any aids and/or assistive devices for moving around, to help with bending or reaching or to help with fine motor skills? Select all that apply.

ReportSection.ReportItem:
How did you hear about the AVOID Frailty program?

{$item}
If you remember the location, please specify: {$item}
Please specify platform: {$item}
Specify: {$item}
Please specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
				$('span#programlocationspecify').hide();
				$('span#programspecify').hide();
				$('span#programotherspecify').hide();
                                function specifyFrail(){
                                        if($("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_avoid").val() == "Poster, flyer, or pamphlet at community venue"){
						$('span#programlocationspecify').show();
						$('span#programspecify').hide();
                                                $('span#programotherspecify').hide();
					}
					else if($("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_avoid").val() == "Social media"){
					        $('span#programlocationspecify').hide();
                                                $('span#programspecify').show();
                                                $('span#programotherspecify').hide();
					}
                                        else if($("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_avoid").val() == "Other"){
					        $('span#programlocationspecify').hide();
                                                $('span#programspecify').hide();
                                                $('span#programotherspecify').show();
                                        }
					else{ 
						$('span#programlocationspecify').hide();
						$('span#programspecify').hide();
						$('span#programotherspecify').hide();
					}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyEmploy);
                                $("select[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_avoid']").change(specifyFrail);
				
				$('span#programplatformotherspecify').hide();
				function specifyPlatform(){
					if($("input:radio[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_platform__specify']:checked").val() == "Other"){
                                                $('span#programplatformotherspecify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#programplatformotherspecify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyPlatform);
                               $("input:radio[name='SociodemographicInformation_program_platform__specify']").change(specifyPlatform);
                        </script>

ReportSection.name: Behavioural Self-Assessment
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Do you perform moderate to vigorous aerobic physical activities such that there is an accumulation of at least 150 minutes per week?

Examples: Moderate intensity - brisk walking, bicycling | Vigorous intensity - cross-country skiing, swimming {$item}

Do you perform muscle strengthening activities using major muscle groups at least twice a week?

Examples: lifting weights, working with resistance bands, heavy gardening (e.g. digging or shoveling) {$item}

Do you perform physical activities that challenge balance daily?

Examples: walking on uneven ground (e.g. unpaved areas or forest trails), Tai Chi, yoga {$item}

Do you do several hours of light physical activities, including standing?

Examples: slow walking, light household tasks (e.g. groceries, washing dishes, cooking), light gardening or watering plants {$item}

Do you limit sedentary behaviour to 8 hours or less daily which includes no more than 3 hours of recreational screen time, and breaking up long periods of sitting as often as possible?

{$item}

Do you get 7 to 8 hours of good-quality sleep on a regular basis, with consistent bed and wake-up times?

Good-quality sleep includes factors such as falling asleep within 30 minutes, not waking more than once through the night, ability to fall back asleep within 20 minutes after waking {$item}

ReportItem.options: I am physically and/or mentally unable to be active|I don't know where/how to get help in my community|I have trouble maintaining a routine when it comes to activity|Other

ReportSection.ReportItem:
What is the hardest part of staying active for you? (choose all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
				$('span#active_specify_end').hide();
					function specifyActiveEnd(){
						if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave1_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave2_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave3_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave4_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave5_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                                        	else{$('span#active_specify_end').hide();}
                       			}
                     		_.defer(specifyActiveEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave1_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave2_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave3_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave4_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
				$("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_behave5_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);

                                $('span#activespecify').hide();
					function specifyActiveOther(){
					var flag = false;
					$('input[name="BehaviouralSelfAssessment_active_specify_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
						if(this.value == "Other"){
							flag = true;
						}
					});
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#activespecify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#activespecify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyActiveOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_active_specify_end[]']").change(specifyActiveOther);

			</script>
VACCINATE
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Have you ever been told by a health care provider that you are not to be vaccinated?

{$item}
Please let us know the reason for this if you are comfortable doing so: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                                $('span#vaxspecify').hide();
                                function specifyVax(){
                                        if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate1_avoid']:checked").val() == "Yes"){
                                                $('span#vaxspecify').show();
                                                $('span#vaccinateyes').hide();
                                        }
                                        else{ 
                                        $('span#vaxspecify').hide();
                                        $('span#vaccinateyes').show();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyVax);
					$("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate1_avoid']").change(specifyVax);
			</script>

What is the main reason that you have not had all of the recommended vaccinations listed above? (choose all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
				$('span#vax_end').hide();
					function specifyVaxEnd(){
						if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate2_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                        	else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate5_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                                else if($("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate6_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}

                                        	else{$('span#vax_end').hide();}
                       			}
                     		_.defer(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate2_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate5_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vaccinate6_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);


                                $('span#vax_end_specify').hide();
                                function specifyVaxOther(){
					var flag = false;
					$('input[name="BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vax_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
						if(this.value == "Other"){
							flag = true;
						}
					});
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#vax_end_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#vax_end_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyVaxOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_vax_end[]']").change(specifyVaxOther);

			</script>

ReportItem.options: I have been restricted due to COVID-19 public health measures|I find it physically/mentally difficult to participate in social interactions|I am not aware of opportunities for social interaction in my community|I have trouble maintaining social connections over time|I do not feel that I need more interaction than I already have|Other

ReportSection.ReportItem:
What have been your main challenge when it comes to social interaction? (choose all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>

                                function getScore(score){
                                        if(score == "None"){return 0}
                                        else if(score=="1"){return 1}
                                        else if(score=="2"){return 2}
                                        else if (score=="3-4"){return 3}
                                        else if(score=="5-8"){return 4}
                                        else{return 5}
                                }

                                function calculateInteractionScore(){
                                        var score1 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact1_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score2 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact2_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score3 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact3_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score4 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact4_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score5 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact5_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score6 = $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSe\lfAssessment_interact6_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        return getScore(score1) + getScore(score2) + getScore(score3) + getScore(score4) + getScore(score5) + getScore(score6)
                                }

				$('span#interact_end').hide();
                                function specifyInteractEnd(){
                                        if(calculateInteractionScore() < 12 ){
                                                $('span#interact_end').show();
                                        }
                                        else{
                                                $('span#interact_end').hide();
                                        }
                                }
                     		_.defer(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact1_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact2_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact3_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact4_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact5_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact6_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);


                                $('span#interact_end_specify').hide();
                                function specifyInteractOther(){
					var flag = false;
					$('input[name="BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
						if(this.value == "Other"){
							flag = true;
						}
					});
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#interact_end_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#interact_end_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyInteractOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='BehaviouralSelfAssessment_interact_end[]']").change(specifyInteractOther);

			</script>
